Question: EmdoorVR Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
EmdoorVR

Product 1: VisionSE
- Cost-effective entry-level MR All-in-one

Product 2: A863 Pro
- Self-developed Pancake optics
- Binocular 4K+ high-refresh-rate screen
- Color binocular capabilities

Note: Additional content regarding other companies or events, such as the copycat Vision Pro from China or the Hi-Tech Fair, is not relevant to EmdoorVR's CES 2024 highlights and has been omitted.
